node.title: Police still negotiating with activists shovelling coal off Queensland freight train
node.alt: Two people stand on top of a train wagon shovelling coal onto the ground.
node.description: One protester has been arrested over the protest, which began yesterday afternoon.
node.content:
["Police are negotiating with environmental activists who have climbed onto a train carrying coal from the Carmichael Mine in central Queensland.", "Yesterday one person allegedly locked themselves onto the train near Collinsville, in North Queensland, while two others climbed onto the wagons and began using shovels to remove the coal.", "A 75-year-old man has been charged with trespassing, while the other two people remain on the train.", "The Bowen Rail Company train was transporting the coal to the export terminal at Abbot Point near Bowen.", "Overnight, activist group Frontline Action on Coal said\u00a0the protesters had created \"two sizeable\" piles of coal next to the train line.", "\"The best place for this coal is back to the earth, where it should never have left,\" the group said in a statement.", "\"The mine is an environmental and social disaster,\u00a0it is shameful that they are still planning to export coal.", "\"That's why people who care about this planet have been there to disrupt every shipment of coal Adani have made so far, and that's why we will continue to stop them.\"", "It comes weeks after multiple similar incidents with activists throughout the area, and just days after\u00a0a Ball Bay man was fined $1,000 after suspending himself from coal loading equipment at Abbot Point at the start of the month.", "", "
One activist allegedly locked himself onto the rail line near Collinsville.(Supplied:\u00a0Frontline Action on Coal)
", "
Call for tougher penalties
", "The overnight actions have been slammed by mine and port operator, Bravus, the Australian arm of Adani.", "The company posted to social media stating the actions were \"not safe, and against the law\".", "Bravus has previously called for harsher consequences for those convicted of illegal actions that disrupt mining operations.", "\"Instances like this are exactly why we are calling for tougher penalties for these illegal activities,\" the company said via social media.", "", "
Frontline Action on Coal members climbed onto the train near Collinsville.(Supplied:\u00a0Frontline Action on Coal)
", "Adani Australia chief executive and country head Lucas Dow reiterated those sentiments.", "\"We've got a handful of repeat and deliberate offenders taking the law into their own hands and engaging in illegal activities, having impact on many operations,\" he said.", "\"[They] are putting themselves \u2013 and our they're also putting our workforce \u2013 in harm's way, and the police officers that have to respond to this.\"", "The LNP Member for Capricornia, Michelle Landry, agreed tougher penalties were needed.", "\"I just get really frustrated when these people think that this is a big game, to go and hijack coal trains,\" he said.", "The negotiations with the remaining activists at Collinsville are ongoing."]
